== This area refers to Edubuntu prior to 23.04 ==

{| class="wikitable"

| <style="width:96px; border:#333333 1px none"> <nowiki>[[File:edubuntuwiki.jpg]]</nowiki>
| <style="border:#333333 1px none"> '''Edubuntu''' is an Ubuntu flavour targeted at schools and other educational environments.  It is a complete operating system, built on the popular <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu]]</nowiki> distribution, that includes an office suite, web browser and many educational applications. Edubuntu is designed for a teacher or network administrator to be able to setup a complete classroom quickly and easily. This wiki serves as a workspace for Edubuntu developers, including coders, artists and documenters. To find out more about Edubuntu, we recommend visiting <nowiki>[[http://edubuntu.org|our website]]</nowiki>.
|}
